elements.title: ‘Jirisan,’ ‘Inspector Koo,’ and ‘Happiness’ Finales See Ratings Rise
elements.contents: tvN’s Jirisan, JTBC’s Inspector Koo, and TvN’s Happiness all saw boosts in ratings. According to Nielsen Korea, the final episode of Jirisan scored an average nationwide rating of 9.225 percent.
